column4: what are you trying to do?  can you be a little more specific
yes when i hit enter on the boot screen, the ubuntu logo comes up...and then after about a min or so i get this message saying that the job control turned off
after it says the job has stopped?
have you tried any of the other options on the boot screen, has ubuntu ever booted
i just installed it using a Live CD
try booting into recovery mode.  It will be an option at boot
i tried that and it got so far
and then i just had a blinking cursor
yoyoned....should i have waited longer in recovery boot?
I'm not sure, that is an unusual error.
yoyned: tell you what ill try again and come back...by the way the message that i get says /bin/sh: can't acces tty, job control turned off
are you using nay wierd hardware
yoyened not that i know of....its a hp laptop....the livecd worked
